name: conditional-decorator
description: Decorator's decorator for applying it on the target conditionally

scripts.build: tsc && cp src/*.js dist/ && mv src/*.d.ts dist/
scripts.test: npm run build && mocha --compilers ts:espower-typescript/guess test/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:watch: npm run build && mocha --compilers ts:espower-typescript/guess test/*.spec.ts -w

author: tkqubo
